application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to condition 8 (external lighting strategy), of Full Planning Permission application reference 20/2653 dated 30/11/2020 for Change of use and conversion of upper floors together with part single, part 4-storey rear extension to facilitate the creation of 9 residential units and works to include 5x rear and 6x front dormer windows; rear first and second floor balconies, new rear entrance lobby and lift for disabled access, rear staircase, refuse stores, secured cycle parking amenity space, soft and hard landscaping and ground floor rear management office extension, first floor rear lift access extension, redesign lower ground cycle spaces, new fences with site access gate.
